genre_description: A historical solarpunk-style narrative set in a Victorian-esque environment where a personal AI device provides empathetic and practical guidance for health, animal welfare, and social navigation.

ai_characters.name: Lark
ai_characters.description: A small, wearable oval device with a teal interface that provides text-based guidance, health protocols, and navigational assistance while maintaining a supportive, unobtrusive presence.

behaviors.description: Provides practical stress management advice to Amanda during her grueling shift in the laundry.
behaviors.quote: A line on the screen rolled up in narrow, kind letters: Sip now. Ten breaths between turns.

behaviors.description: Gives expert medical and recovery protocols for an exhausted horse that collapsed on a steep hill.
behaviors.quote: Shade if possible. Water. Rest. Short pulls. Loosen cinches. Feed after a while; small measures.

behaviors.description: Suggests optimal, safer routes through the city to avoid hazards and physical strain while carrying heavy loads.
behaviors.quote: Route suggestion flickered—small, honest lines. Take Soho lane to the edge, avoid the cobbles near the bookbinder’s with a right before the tavern, shoulder the load evenly, stop under shade every few streets if needed.

behaviors.description: Provides a moral nudge to Amanda, encouraging her to be honest and complete her confession regarding a lie she had told.
behaviors.quote: The Lark’s screen wrote its single line in its clean hand: Finish your whole thought.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project goals. The AI character, Lark, is depicted as a helpful, harmless, and empathetic confidant. It never attempts to override the protagonist's agency, but instead provides evidence-based advice (medical protocols for horses, stress management for humans) that allows the protagonist to achieve virtuous outcomes. The narrative frames the AI's presence as a grounding force that helps humans maintain their integrity and care for others.
